item.title: 乌拉圭央行行长认为通胀目标还有下调空间
item.description: 乌拉圭央行主席华盛顿-里贝罗（Washington Ribeiro）在接受采访时表示，随着货币政策控制住乌拉圭投资级同业中最快的通胀率之一，乌拉圭下届政府可能有余地设定较低的年度消费物价涨幅目标。【原文：Uruguay’s next government may have room to set a lower target for annual consumer price gains as monetary policy reins in one of the fastest inflation rates among the country’s investment grade peers, central bank Chairman Washington Ribeiro said in an interview.】

item.title: 华尔街专业人士保持头脑清醒，对冲工具开始重新发挥作用
item.description: 本周华尔街内外的戏剧性事件至少带来了一丝曙光：主要的防御性投资策略仍有生命力&mdash；恢复了人们对近年来失灵的对冲交易的信心。【原文：There’s at least one silver lining from this week’s drama on Wall Street and beyond: Key defensive investing strategies are alive and well — restoring faith in hedging trades that have misfired in recent years.】

item.title: 斯利姆斥资增持美国石油公司 PBF 和 Talos 的股份
item.description: 拉丁美洲首富卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）利用股市大跌的机会，增持了他在两家美国能源公司的多数股权。【原文：Carlos Slim, Latin America’s richest person, took advantage of the equity-market selloff to boost his majority stakes in two US energy companies.】

item.title: 周一大跌后多伦多预计将出现大规模补涨交易
item.description: 周一大跌期间，多伦多证券交易所因公民假日休市，周二加拿大股市将迎来一场令人心碎的补涨交易。【原文：Canadian stocks are poised for a gut-wrenching catch up trade on Tuesday, after the Toronto Stock Exchange was closed for a civic holiday during Monday’s selloff.】

item.title: 公司在波动性抑制交易后重回债券市场
item.description: 由于担心劳动力市场过快降温和经济走向衰退，潜在的债务发行人纷纷退避三舍，在经历了全球大跌之后，企业借款人又开始重返高等级债务市场。【原文：Corporate borrowers are easing back into the high-grade debt market after a global selloff — sparked by concerns the labor market is cooling too fast and the economy is heading for a recession — sidelined potential issuers.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦获得中国和阿联酋的债务延期保证
item.description: 巴基斯坦已获得中国、沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国承诺将债务展期一年，这对该国来说是一个鼓舞，因为它正在等待国际货币基金组织对其新的 70 亿美元贷款计划的最终批准。【原文：Pakistan has secured commitments from China, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates to rollover debt for a year, a boost for the nation as it awaits a final approval for its new $7 billion loan program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 舍弗勒称电动车热潮将带动混合动力需求增长
item.description: 由于美国和中国的驾驶员更愿意购买混合动力汽车，电动汽车普及速度的不确定性日益增加，舍弗勒股份公司正在放慢纯电动零部件的生产速度。【原文：Schaeffler AG is slowing the ramp-up for all-electric components as drivers in the US and China prefer to buy hybrid vehicles with growing uncertainty around the speed of EV uptake.】

item.title: Pagaya 在次级汽车贷款机构中扩大人工智能核保范围
item.description: Pagaya Technologies Ltd. 通过与 OneMain Holdings Inc.【原文：Pagaya Technologies Ltd. is expanding its reach in the auto-lending industry through a new partnership with OneMain Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 爱科高层推动拖拉机制造商更换董事会
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拖拉机和其他农业设备制造商爱科公司（AGCO Corp.【原文：AGCO Corp., a maker of tractors and other agricultural equipment, is facing demands for a board shakeup from its largest shareholder, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿格斯称法国将迎来 1983 年以来最差小麦收成
item.description: 据预测，由于欧盟最大的小麦种植国降雨过多，法国将迎来 40 多年来最糟糕的软小麦收成。【原文：France is forecast to see its worst soft wheat harvest in more than 40 years due to excessive rain in the European Union’s top grower.】

item.title: 石油处于超卖状态，但在宏观列车前方
item.description:
原油暴跌是否真正结束取决于更广泛的市场。【原文：

Whether crude’s rout is truly finished hinges on the wider markets.

】

item.title: RBC 称俄罗斯阻止了向 Efes 出售啤酒合资公司股权的协议
item.description: 据报纸报道，由财政部长安东-西卢安诺夫（Anton Siluanov）担任主席的俄罗斯政府委员会拒绝批准将 Anheuser-Busch InBev 在俄罗斯合资企业中的股份出售给其土耳其合作伙伴 Anadolu Efes。【原文：A Russian government commission chaired by Finance Minister Anton Siluanov refused to approve the sale of Anheuser-Busch InBev’s stake in a Russian joint venture to its Turkish partner Anadolu Efes, according to a newspaper report.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司首席执行官称石油需求强劲，近期大跌是过度反应
item.description: 全球最大的原油出口国沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）表示，由于需求依然强劲，全球石油市场受经济坏消息影响而出现的大跌是过度的。【原文：The selloff in global oil markets on perceived bad economic news was overdone because demand remains strong, according to top crude exporter Saudi Aramco.】

item.title: 巴西央行将在必要时毫不犹豫地加息
item.description: 巴西央行表示，由于拉美最大经济体的通胀前景更具挑战性，它将毫不犹豫地上调基准利率。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said it won’t hesitate to hike the benchmark interest rate due to a more challenging inflation outlook in Latin America’s largest economy.】

item.title: 真主党与以色列军队交火，紧张局势加剧
item.description: 真主党和以色列军队于周二交火。【原文：Hezbollah and Israeli forces exchanged fire on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新加坡通过反洗钱法案
item.description: 新加坡已通过立法，旨在加强对流入这个亚洲金融中心的资金的监管。【原文：Singapore has passed legislation designed to tighten gaps around the policing of money flowing into the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: Uber 乘车和送货需求强劲，业绩稳步增长
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. reported better-than-expected gross bookings in the second quarter, underscoring continued strong demand for rideshare and delivery services.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒利润超出预期，得益于更强的定价能力
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc. reported second-quarter earnings that beat analyst expectations, helped by stronger pricing that helped offset a drop in sales.】

item.title: 日本高管努力解读股票和日元的波动性
item.description: 由于日本股票和外汇市场的剧烈波动，日本最大的公司正竭力为投资者提供明确的指导，这给它们未来几个月的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Japan’s biggest companies are struggling to provide clear guidance to investors as the extreme volatility in the country’s equities and foreign exchange markets cloud their outlooks for the coming months.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场在经历了猛烈的暴跌之后恢复了平静，但反弹的前景正在减弱。与此同时，投资者正在为未来的暴跌做准备。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Markets return to calmer waters after a ferocious selloff, but the prospect of a rebound is fading. Meanwhile, investors are building up protection against future crashes. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 洲际酒店首席执行官称美国酒店需求抵御经济担忧
item.description: 洲际酒店集团（InterContinental Hotels Group Plc）首席执行官表示，美国的酒店需求没有出现引发周一全球市场大跌的潜在衰退迹象。【原文：Hotel demand in the US shows no sign of a potential recession that triggered Monday’s global market selloff, according to the chief executive officer of InterContinental Hotels Group Plc.】

item.title: 肥胖症制药商面临高盈利预期的考验
item.description: 最近几周，礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. and Novo Nordisk A/S have had their years-long stock momentum halted in recent weeks, putting extra importance on this week’s earnings from the obesity drugmakers.】

item.title: 花旗集团交易部门又遭 "有毒文化 "指控
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-奥莱利（Christine O'Reilly）当时正在迈阿密与朋友聚会，她在花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Christine O’Reilly was with friends in Miami, when one of her biggest clients at Citigroup Inc. kept buzzing her phone.】

item.title: 出售收益疲软，惠誉下调丹格特工业公司评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）下调了对丹格特工业有限公司（Dangote Industries Ltd.）信用度的评估，理由包括 "由于处置收益低于预期，集团的流动性状况严重恶化"，并将其评级置于负面观察状态。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded its assessment of Dangote Industries Ltd.’s creditworthiness, citing factors including a “significant deterioration in the group’s liquidity position following lower-than-expected disposal proceeds,” and placed its ratings on a negative watch.】

item.title: 高盛称下跌 5%后买入 S&P 500 通常有利可图
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Buying US stocks after a slump of the scale witnessed over the past month has usually been profitable, according to a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysis of four decades of data.】

item.title: 多伦多房价连续第二个月攀升，但销售仍在放缓
item.description: 在需求降温的情况下，多伦多房价仍连续第二个月上涨。【原文：Toronto home prices rose for the second straight month even as demand cooled.】

item.title: 贡渥集团将购买道达尔巴基斯坦加油站50%的股份
item.description: 贡渥集团有限公司同意购买道达尔能源 SE 在巴基斯坦加油站网络中的 50% 股份，这是一家大型商品贸易商进军燃料零售业的最新举措。【原文：Gunvor Group Ltd. agreed to buy TotalEnergies SE’s 50% stake in a filling-station network in Pakistan, the latest move by a major commodity trader into fuel retail.】

item.title: 印尼延长面料进口关税以保护当地企业利益
item.description: 印尼重新对某些面料的进口征收额外关税，以保护当地工业免受来自海外的大量商品的冲击。【原文：Indonesia has reimposed additional tariffs on imports of certain fabrics to protect the local industry from the flood of goods coming from overseas.】

item.title: S&P 公司称英国建筑业产出创两年来最大增幅
item.description: 工党政府在大选中上台执政，承诺刺激建筑业发展，受此推动，英国建筑业产出实现了两年多来的最快增长。【原文：UK construction output grew at the fastest pace in more than two years, boosted by the culmination of the election that brought to power a Labour government promising to spur building.】

item.title: 银行家认为市场崩溃时您应该（和不应该）做什么
item.description: 周一的大跌导致全球财富连续三周缩水 6.4 万亿美元，在这样的日子里，个人理财专家通常会向警惕性较高的散户投资者提出同样的建议：【原文：On days like Monday’s dramatic selloff, which capped a three-week loss of $6.4 trillion in global wealth, personal finance experts usually have the same advice for wary retail investors:】
